page.title: 21Leeds- Liverpool Canal
page.content:
The Leeds-Liverpool canal in 2011 is a more leisure facility than a transport facility,my house backs onto the canal in Maghull and every sunday all day you hear children and familys passing by... i often walk from my house on greenbank avenue, near the green lane swing bridge down the canal to the running horses pub on bells lane where we often get some food and drink, its loverly there from the running horses pub onwards its just deep countryside... i also often ride my bike to the medows library down the canal, as the roads are a little to busy!
James Jones
